updates: - fix: image sending status issue.

- add: support to new server version with channel creation api change.
- fix: bugs related with FCM Push Notifications.
- fix: bugs related with auto-delete messages.
- fix: bugs related with auto-delete messages.
- add: auto-delete messages.
- fix: some simplified Chinese translation.
- add: simplified Chinese.
- add: improvement on message retrieving.
- add: invitation link QR code and scanning.
- add: potential error message output during login.
- fix: UI in auth pages.
- fix: http websites does not open in Android.
- fix: UI error after deleting account.
- fix: data interference between servers if data is being loaded.
- fix: disable mentions and solve cursor issue in DMs.
- fix: improve online state stability.
- fix: archive messages might stay in loading status.
- fix: minor issues in invitation link validation.
- add: check updates and changelog.
- fix: disable super admin (uid == 1) access to deleting their account.
- fix: some files do not open due to path and file name issues.
- fix: add channel list comparison when connection establishes, delete extra ones if necessary.
- fix: invitation link validation might output wrongly with localhost server deployment.
- fix: check invitation link validity before jumping to sign up page.
